categories: Category:Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple

nodes.text: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple, which ties in to the video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. The issue was written by Matthew Rosenberg, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and published on September 25, 2019 by Marvel Comics.

Following a sudden ambush in the jungles of Ontotho, Young Padawan Cere Junda is left to find her own way on a hostile planet. But local freedom fighters are happy to take Cere Junda in – if she will fight by their side!
